issue.title: [C++] Be less stringent about finding include/hdfs.h in HADOOP_HOME
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-405](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-405). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The user's Hadoop distribution may not have `hdfs.h` in the expected location. If `$HADOOP_HOME` is set, but hdfs.h is not found, we can safely fall back to the vendored one because the libhdfs API has been reasonably stable over time.
